    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2819</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Keep our world clean -student activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halten Sie unsere Welt sauber - 
Kursteilnehmeraktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maintenez notre monde propre - activité 
d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mantenha nosso mundo limpo - atividade do 
estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mantenga il nostro mondo pulito - attività 
dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κρατήστε τον κόσμο μας καθαρό - δραστηριότητα 
σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mantenga nuestro mundo limpio - actividad del 
estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment of an activity where students learn about environmental issues through discussion, slogan writing and preparation of a poster</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sentence writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slogan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung 
einer Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer über Klimaausgaben durch 
Diskussion, Sloganschreiben und Vorbereitung eines Plakats erlernen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation 
d'une activité où les étudiants se renseignent sur les issues 
environnementales par la discussion, l'écriture de slogan et la 
préparation d'une affiche</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação 
de uma atividade onde os estudantes aprendam sobre edições 
ambientais através da discussão, da escrita do slogan e da 
preparação de um poster</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione di
un'attività dove gli allievi imparano circa le edizioni ambientali 
attraverso la discussione, la scrittura di slogan e la preparazione di
un manifesto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση μιας 
δραστηριότητας όπου οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τα περιβαλλοντικά
ζητήματα μέσω της συζήτησης, του γραψίματος συνθήματος και της 
προετοιμασίας μιας αφίσας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen de
una actividad donde los estudiantes aprenden sobre ediciones 
ambientales a través de la discusión, de la escritura del lema y de 
la preparación de un cartel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsatzschreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
